          â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€        â–€â–€         â–€                 â–€         â–€â–€        â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€
         
     
          Monstrum takes the traditional survival horror formula  and remixes
          it completely with procedurally generated levels,  permadeath,  and
          AI driven predators, ensuring that nowhere on  its  derelict  cargo
          ship  is ever  truly safe.  Offering up  a challenge  to  even  the
          hardiest of gamers, Monstrum will force you to use  your  wits  and
          whatever tools you can find to outrun or outsmart your pursuer.
     
          For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/296710/

          - Extract

          - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
